name: Hoarding Cats
description:
You are an old cat spirit, saving the cats of the neighbourhood from the urban concrete wasteland. The locals, however, don't see you as the saviour of cats. Avoid seagulls, or shoo them away with your umbrella.

To return home and collect the cats, stop, think of home and jump into your thoughts. Your umbrella is not just an offensive tool either.

This game was made in one weekend in the Global Game Jam / Finnish Game Jam 2019. https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/hoarding-cats
